attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want this because after having a recent experience in hospital i was place with a small baby and a child of 5. i am a 16 year old teenager and didnt appriciate being stuck on a ward with disney pictures. i was to young to go on an adult ward. i feel that teenagers aged 12 to young adults 25 should have there own ward
